omr:folder.name: risk_workactivity
omr:folder.description: If you work, does your work involve any physical activity?

omr:variable.name: No_work
omr:variable.description: I don't currently work

omr:variable.name: No_physical
omr:variable.description: My work involves no physical activity

omr:variable.name: Light_physical
omr:variable.description: My work involves light physical activity

omr:variable.name: Heavy_physical
omr:variable.description: My work involves heavy physical activity

omr:variable.name: DK

omr:folder.name: risk_exercise
omr:folder.description: Apart from work, do you undertake any regular physical exercise over and above that of daily living?

omr:variable.name: Light_activity
omr:variable.description: Light activity (walking, golf, etc.)

omr:variable.name: Moderately_vigorous
omr:variable.description: Moderately vigorous activity (gym, sports, etc.) for 20 minutes or more, once or twice per week

omr:variable.name: Heavy_vigorous
omr:variable.description: Heavy vigorous activity more than twice per week

omr:variable.name: Extreme_exercise
omr:variable.description: Extreme exercise (long distance cycling, marathon running, etc)

omr:variable.name: PNA
omr:variable.description: Apart from work, do you undertake any regular physical exercise over and above that of daily living?:Prefer not to answer

omr:variable.name: DK
omr:variable.description: Apart from work, do you undertake any regular physical exercise over and above that of daily living?:Don't know
